chunk:
Nourish London PROTECT HYDRATING MOISTURISER

Brand: Nourish London

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin**, Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, Glycine soja (soybean) oil*, Cetearyl alcohol, Cetearyl glucoside, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf powder*, Citrus limon (lemon) fruit powder*, Sodium levulinate, Levu

ium levulinate, Levulinic acid, Rosa canina (rosehip) fruit oil*, Cetearyl olivate, Sorbitan olivate, Glyceryl stearate, Citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil expressed*, Citrus nobilis (mandarin orange) peel oil*, Xanthan gum, Potassium sorbate, Sodium ascorbyl phosphate, Limonene, Linalool.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxici
rgies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
